analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs

original: 8.55. Kilesakilesasampayuttaduka🔽Nakilesañceva nakilesavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva nakilesavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Nakilesavippayuttañceva nano ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakilesavippayutto ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na kilesa vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na kilesa vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na kilesa vippayuttam ca iva na no ca kilesam dhammam paṭicca na kilesa vippayuttaḥ ca iva na no ca kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: The Pairs in the Chapter on Defilements🔽With a non-defiled and not-connected to defilements as condition, a non-defiled and not-connected to defilements …🔽With a non-defiled and connected to defilements and a non-defiled and not-connected to defilements as condition, a non-defiled and connected to defilements …

original: Nakilesañceva nakilesavippayuttañca nakilesavippayuttañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva nakilesavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na kilesa vippayuttañca na kilesa vippayuttañca ca iva na no ca kilesam ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na kilesa vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a non-defiled and not-connected to defilements and a non-defiled and connected to defilements as condition, a non-defiled and not-connected to defilements … (In brief.)
In the case of cause, there are nine … non-conflict, nine.
